column2:
Moves such as b+1 and f+1+2 are enhanced
Gains access to df+1,3+4 and 3+4 for pressure
column7:
Safe long reaching mid that is safe on block. Useful for
 approaching and fishing for Heat engager in the midrange.

Quick shoulder. Mostly useful for punishment situations
 as it's very unsafe on block.
Mostly useful as a punish from a crouching position.
Safe heat engager from backturn stance.

Fast attack out of Kenpo stance. Useful for punishing
 opponents after making their attacks whiff with Kenpo.

Fast attack to start offense and check situations. Use 1,2
 or 1,3 to safely test if a move is punishable on block.
 1,1 is also a very strong extension to check aggressive
 opponents, potentially counterhit launching them.

column3:
must absorb two hits
for the follow-up to come out

column7:
Very fast high you can use as a strong panic button and to
 check opponents overextending on their offense.
 It becomes enhanced and safer to use during Heat.
Mid poke to harass the opponent.
column12:
f,f+4,3 (delay 2nd hit) ⏵ df+4,3 ⏵ b+4,2~DF 2 T!
uf+3 ⏵ (dash) 3,1+2

column7:
Fast mid poke to check opponents sidestepping to Feng's
 weak side. During heat, you can use the b+4,3+4 extension
 for pressure and back turned mixups.

column2:
CH b+1
heat on b+1

CH BT 1+2
CH ub+1

column7:
A mid knee attack that can be used for pressure.
 You can shift to crouch dash by inputting b+3,DF

Safe mid launcher you can use for mixup situations but 
 also to hit opponents on the ground.

column12: heat on b+4,3+4 ⏵ BT d+3 (or BT d+3)

column7:
High crushing lows to harass the opponent. db+3 is stronger
 but riskier, so use d+2 when you want a safer option

Use this stance in the midrange to create whiffs when you
 expect the opponent's approach.
 Can also be used along with moves with pushback on block
 to create spacing traps.
column12: f+4,2 T! ⏵ heat on b+4,3+4 ⏵ BT 3 (or BT d+3)

After heat burst, follow with uf+3 into a short dash b+4,3+4
for as pike into a guaranteed BT 3

df+4,3 and f+3,4 can be used for wall carry at mid distance
and uf+3 or 1,4 for short carry.

column7: STANDING

column12:
In combos, db+1,2,4 can be used to break the floor
or f,f+3 to break it with a single hit. Use b+1+2 for wall break.
